meanings.definition: To remain in a particular place or position.
meanings.sent1: The cat stayed on the windowsill all day.
meanings.sent2: I stayed at home during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The toy car stayed on the track without falling off.
meanings.sent4: Her words stayed in my mind long after she left.
meanings.sent5: The memory of his laughter stayed with me forever.

meanings.definition: To continue to be in a particular state or condition.
meanings.sent1: The fire stayed hot for hours.
meanings.sent2: She stayed calm during the emergency.
meanings.sent3: The colors of the painting stayed vibrant over time.
meanings.sent4: His determination stayed unwavering despite the challenges.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh bread stayed in the kitchen all day.

meanings.sent1: Please stay here and wait for me.
meanings.sent2: I stayed to watch the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The bus stayed at the stop for a long time.
meanings.sent4: The clock stayed at midnight, frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The teacher stayed after class to help the students.
